    Resume

    Professional Summary

    UX/UI designer and User Experience Design master’s student with over four years of experience combining design fundamentals with practical generative AI workflows. Skilled in translating complex requirements into actionable solutions through research, design systems, and collaborative processes.

    Professional Experience

    Graphic Designer

    SAM IT Solutions, North Carolina, USA · Remote
    April 2021 – January 2025

    Led end-to-end UI/UX redesigns for client websites and digital products. Built scalable design systems in Figma, collaborated with cross-functional teams, and delivered responsive front-end designs. Created brand identities across IT, hospitality, and industrial automation sectors. Improved project efficiency through AI-assisted workflows and process optimization.

    UI/UX Designer Intern

    Varidx, North Carolina, USA · Remote
    October 2020 – March 2021

    Designed dashboards and user flows for a smart city platform. Worked closely with engineers to define KPIs, data visualization requirements, and usability constraints.

    Front-end Developer Intern

    Guras Technology, Kathmandu, Nepal
    September 2019 – December 2019

    Translated Figma designs into responsive React components. Focused on performance, accessibility, and cross-browser consistency.

    Education

    Master of Science in User Experience Design

    Technische Hochschule Ingolstadt, Germany
    April 2025 – Present

    Focus on human-computer interaction, communication design, and information systems management. Actively exploring generative AI in UX research and design processes.

    Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and Information Technology

    Tribhuvan University, Nepal
    2015 – 2020

    Strong foundation in software engineering, web technologies, and system analysis. Capstone project focused on recommendation systems.

    Skills Snapshot

    UX/UI Design, Design Systems, User Research, Figma, Adobe Creative Cloud, Generative AI Tools, Prompt Engineering, AI-Assisted Development, Analytics, Project Management
